title.bibl: Chicago Tribune, Jan. 30, 1892. [Concert for Anderson Monument]

notesStmt.note: Transcribed from digital images contributed to the Internet Archive by the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign.

sourceDesc.bibl: Chicago Foreign Language Press Survey, 1936-1941, Works Projects Administration, Chicago Public Library Omnibus Project

div.bibl: Chicago Tribune, Jan. 30, 1892. [CONCERT FOR ANDERSON MONUMENT]

body.p: The Hans Christian Anderson Monument Association gave a concert in Central Music Hall last evening, to raise funds toward a $5,000 monument in Chicago to the Danish author. The concert was under the direction of August Hyllested; Carter H. Harrison made an address.
Those who took part in the musical program were: Clarence Eddy, August Hyllestad, Bicknell Young, Frederic Hess, and Elena Varesi Boccabadatio.
